import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { CategorieService } from '../services/categorie.service'; import { Categorie } from '../models/categorie'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { constructor(private router: Router,private categorieService: CategorieService) { } addRecette(): void{ this.router.navigate(['recettes/add']); } categories: Categorie[] = []; ngOnInit() { this.loadCategories(); } loadCategories() { this.categorieService.getCategories().subscribe( (data: any) => { this.categories = data.slice(0,5);console.log(this.categories) }, error => { console.log('Une erreur s\'est produite lors du chargement des catégories : ', error); } ); } viewRecetteBycategory(id: number | undefined): void { this.router.navigate(['/recettes', id]); } }
